page.para: Deeksha and Ritika get a fright
It is evening. Deeksha and her friend Ritika have been shopping. They are walking home.
Aditya and his friend Sai are following them. The boys whisper and giggle.
Deeksha and Ritika do not like this place. The bushes are so thick! They hurry along.
Suddenly, they hear rustling in the bushes. A white shape appears. “Wooo! Wooo! Wooo!” it says.
The terrified girls drop their shopping. ‘Crack!’ go Deeksha’s eggs. ‘Splat!’ goes Ritika’s oil.
“Run, Ritika, run,” screams Deeksha. The two girls run as fast as their legs can carry them.
When Deeksha gets home, she is still shaking. She tells her mum what happened.
“Someone played a trick!” says mum. “Where are the eggs?” “I dropped them,” says Deeksha.
At that moment the door opens. In comes Aditya. He is smiling. “Hello,” he says.
Then Deeksha sees something sticking out of Aditya’s schoolbag. It is white cloth!
“Oh mum, it was Aditya. Look!” says Deeksha. She pulls and pulls and pulls the cloth.
“Aditya!” says mum. “You took my sheet. You scared your sister. She dropped the eggs.”
Aditya says nothing. He looks at mum. He is waiting to hear what the punishment will be.
